programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group has a difficult time molding to a new lifestyle, forcing them to consider whether they can be the people they once were.

programme.desc: As Rick and the others continue to acclimate to their new surroundings, they consider a return to normalcy.

programme.desc: While trying to secure a new home, Rick and his group face challenges, and question the utopia they find themselves in.

programme.desc: When life within the walls begins to mimic life outside, the group realizes that sheltered life may not be possible.

programme.desc: Daryl finds trouble while on a run; Rick and the group feel like outsiders in Alexandria, where trouble approaches the gates.

programme.desc: When it appears that things are starting to normalize in the settlement, a new problem arises for the Alexandrians.

programme.desc: A small group, including Rick, runs into hurdles while trying to return to Alexandria, and some may not make it back.

programme.desc: Morgan recalls his travels from King County to Alexandria, where he encountered a solo survivor who taught him a new code to live by.

programme.desc: The sheltered citizens inside the walls of Alexandria must face a grim reality that might be too much for them to handle; Deanna doubts her leadership.

programme.desc: Daryl, Abraham and Sasha encounter many obstacles and a new threat while trying to return to Alexandria.

programme.desc: Alexandria is finally able to begin pulling itself back together; peace is embraced between the two groups.

programme.desc: After a few moments of peace, trouble finds its way to Alexandria again with a threat that may be too big to defeat.

programme.desc: Now that walkers have shown up inside the gates of Alexandria, Rick and the other survivors are scared and outnumbered.

programme.desc: A simple scavenging run proves to be more tricky, when the survivors are not the only ones after a goldmine of supplies.

programme.desc: After realizing that Alexandria may not be as safe as he originally thought, Rick must make decisions about where to go.

programme.desc: When someone goes missing in Alexandria, the community goes on alert, and search parties venture out.

programme.desc: For a number of familiar faces, a new, well-established community seems too good to be true.

programme.desc: A new group of survivors seem to have it all in their impressive community; however, there is a price.

programme.desc: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria; they receive a sobering visit.
